label: you looked  just like a god carrying out divine retribution.

first_translate: I’ve never seen a sorcerer with such skill.
idiom_translate: I’ve never seen a sorcerer with such skill.
label: I have never seen a mage as powerful  as you.

first_translate: if you must know, I’m the final boss of the future.
idiom_translate: if you must know, I’m the final boss of the future.
label: to tell you  the truth, I’m  the future final boss of this  story.

first_translate: one more step, and I’ll fall to my death.
idiom_translate: one more step and I’ll fall.
label: just a few  more steps,  and we’ll plummet to our deaths.

hangle: 설마 이 정도로는 부족하다고 여기서 던지려는 건 아니지?!
first_translate: you’re not going to throw me off the cliff because you think this isn’t enough, are you?!
idiom_translate: you’re not going to throw me off the cliff because you think this isn’t enough, are you?!
label: he’s not  going to throw me down there because he thinks I wasn’t good enough,  is he?!
